segments.text: Diana , in your opinion , which is more important , IQ or EQ ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why are you asking me the strange question , Jerry ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I watched the movie Forrest Gump last night . And the question just lined in my mind .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well . I think IQ matters more . But it won't work without EQ .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Why ? You seem pretty sure about it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Because an intellectual mind can only be a beneficial thing in life .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But IQ is decided at birth.One can't expect to make a lot of improvement in it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's why people's achievement varies greatly .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ' s true , but what if one comes across some difficulties . He must rely on his EQ to deal with them .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , Jerry , can you share your understanding of EQ ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think it is independent of IQ and plays a prominent role in deciding the way we live our lives .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Quite right . Have you noticed that a high IQ is not a must for one's success ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , his IQ is high enough for him to embrace the success as long as he can manage his EQ .
segments.speaker: S2
